entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add flag to stop using the workload set version and just use the installed manifests #34562
  • Add flag for --skip-workload-sets when installing/update workloads for the old install behavior #34561
  • dotnet pack arguments Extensions #34559
  • TFM specific NuGet warnings/errors are displayed for TFMs that they don't apply to in VS #34547
  • Bring Tye features into the SDK #34535
  • The order of workloads should be after runtime #34533

Closed

  • Maui Sample with errors NU1012 and NETSDK1139 "The target platform identifier android was not recognized" #34548
  • `PublishAot` fail with `error: assembler label '' can not be undefined` #34474

PullRequests

Created

  • Update minimumMSBuildVersion to 17.7.0 #34565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #34560
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #34558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #34557
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add a concept of image family to container base image inference #33163
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • fix AppHostShellShimMaker to make it work well with Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Output the digest of the generated image #34537
    Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #34523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Create default.json file #34414
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support option to not include platform #34530
    untriaged
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34529
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
